question: Which of the following Chinese travelers have mentioned the UNESCO World Heritage site Ajanata Caves in their accounts?
explanation: Both Fa Hien (under the rule of Chandragupta II; 380- 415 CE) and Hieun Tsang (under the rule of emperor Harshavardhana; 606 - 647 CE) have mentioned about Ajanta Caves in their travel accounts.
